content: {"name": "JCC of Staten Island's Kosher Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Online registeration https://market.metcouncil.org/s/?language=en_US", "email": "", "url": "sijcc.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1466 Manor Road ", "address_2": "", "city": "Staten Island ", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10314", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.594975, "longitude": -74.126389}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 475-5242", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit every  2 weeks"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Accepts Walk-ins & Appointments"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Kosher food available"}]}
